name: Tower Of Gelos
description:
Tower Of Gelos is a fun rogue-lite action game set in a dungeon tower. 

This is not the final game. In this demo you'll find 1 environnement, 2 bosses, a few monsters, special rooms and around 20 items to find and use to make you stronger. 

The demo has no ending, you can climb the floors until you run out of health !

If you're using a PS controller, you can change the controls in the input tab within the launcher of the game. 

Have fun and please report any bugs, comments or feedback you have :)

You can follow the development on my twitter : https://twitter.com/YakiEOn
